table.value: CREATE TABLE `wb_role` ( `id` smallint(6) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `pid` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `remark` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `pid` (`pid`) USING BTREE, KEY `status` (`status`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
